content.en: Wind turbine optimization: Researchers are using various data-mining algorithms to predict and diagnose abnormalities in wind turbine subsystems. They are also using neural network algorithms to identify bearing faults in wind turbines. Additionally, advanced signal processing and machine learning methods are being used to improve the reliability of offshore wind turbines by detecting abnormal behavior. These algorithms are helping to optimize fault detection methods and improve the overall performance of wind turbines.
content.da: Optimering af vindmøller: Forskere bruger forskellige data-mining-algoritmer til at forudsige og diagnosticere unormale tilstande i vindmøllers undersystemer. De bruger også neurale netværksalgoritmer til at identificere lejesvigt i vindmøller. Derudover anvendes avanceret signalbehandling og maskinlæringsmetoder til at forbedre pålideligheden af offshore vindmøller ved at opdage unormal adfærd. Disse algoritmer hjælper med at optimere fejldetekteringsmetoder og forbedre den samlede ydeevne af vindmøller.
